metro.GameScreen.MainView

Class StationPlacingTool

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • metro.GameScreen.GameScreen
        • metro.GameScreen.MainView.StationPlacingTool

  • public class StationPlacingTool
extends GameScreen
    A station placing tool makes it possible to create train stations.

    hauke
